attributes.action: Give students access to financial support amidst the global coronavirus crisis
attributes.additional_details:
Although students have access to student loan support during term time, many rely on part time work to make up for any financial shortfall of living costs. Many students have jobs during the summer months when they do not have access to student loan funding. 

Students have also been financially affected by this crisis but this has been overlooked. By the end of summer term, many students will be left without income for three months. Students may have to drop out to be eligible for support.
attributes.background: Many students have been unable to take part in the Treasury scheme for furloughed workers as they are employed on a zero hours or a casual basis. Anyone classed as a full time student is ineligible for universal credit. Lift the restrictions on who is eligible to claim universal credit.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304298
